The War grows desperate, you can army the peasants and continue the fight.
The foreign population in the province is being eradicated
The Peasants are armed and away at war.
The [Root.Culture.GetName] in [Root.GetName] have been very amorous of late, there has been a population boom in the province.
[Root.GetName] has seen a surplus in harvests this year, as liege lord, how would you like to allocate it?
The [Root.Culture.GetName] in [Root.GetName] have been less than prosperous of late, the province has seen a noticeable decline in population.
[Root.GetName] has seen a deficit in harvests this year, as liege lord, how do you wish to respond to the starvation?
Fulfill requirements with grain at market value.
Ask my vassals to fulfull the demands.
So what, a few peasants starve?
